Text: Thanks for making this title available.

Tinny_pb, thanks for saying thanks. Sometimes I don't even know if some of the "independent" comics I've shared are even being read by anyone, so you guys that show interest and gratitude keep me motivated to post them.

I love 2000ad stuff was not sure anyone else did
Thanks!!!!!

Love 2000ad. I used to read this all the time when I lived in the UK, it's been a harder to find over here so I gave up. (local comic shop is 15 miles away and closed whenever I get a day off). This is awesome, a huge thanks.
really glad you all enjoy it. will try to ensure that it's posted whenever Nahga or other scanners release it.
Thanks for these. Used to read them back in the early 80's
